name: Sky Dodger
description:
My first game using Godot - based on the 'my first game' Godot Tutorial.

"Sky Dodger" requires you to pilot your aircraft and avoid the various clouds; the longer you stay alive, the more points you get. Collectables can also be obtained (some helpful, some not).

There's also a secret hidden 'difficult' mode that will really test your reflexes. Good luck!

Controls: Use arrow keys to steer

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Please report any bugs found

-Music courtesy of dl-sounds.com

-SFX created using Bfxr

-Sprites created using Hexels & Photoshop
